physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features two ladies. Both of them are looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured. They have their arms around one another. They are standing on a carpeted floor. The background of the photograph shows the interior of a house. Chairs
 table
 and a wall clock can be seen.

sgcool_label_text:This photograph shows Alice and Agnes Tan
 daughters of prominent Malayan Peranakan politician and businessman  Tun Dato\u0027 Sir Tan Cheng Lock
 posing inside a house.
